io.github.nozyx12.jevent

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.nozyx12.jevent.EventManager

  • public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventManager class manages the registration of event listeners and triggers events. It allows for the registration of listeners and handles the invocation of their respective event handling methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerListener(EventListener listener)
      Registers a new event listener.
      void triggerEvent(java.lang.String eventName, java.lang.String... args)
      Triggers an event with the specified name and arguments.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventManager

        public EventManager()

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(EventListener listener)
        Registers a new event listener. If the listener is already registered, it will not be added again.
        Parameters:
        listener - the event listener to register

      • triggerEvent

        public void triggerEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
                         java.lang.String... args)
                  throws EventException
        Triggers an event with the specified name and arguments. All registered listeners will be notified of the event. If an error occurs in a listener, an EventException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the name of the event to trigger
        args - additional arguments related to the event
        Throws:
        EventException - if an error occurs while triggering the event
